posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Jennings two hand graded SGC 5. Great looking card, as you would expect from the grade! 

SOLD $500 shipped via tracked USPS First Class. Open to a variety of payment methods - price is net to me, buyer pays any fees for your payment method of choice. 

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/RAgsvlq.png[/IMG]
